trans-unit.source: Do not add css file. You can copy and adapt Resources/Public/Css/styles.css to your own needs
Set to true to enlarge iframes to full width of the container, keeping the aspect ratio.
Set to 0 to not process youtube embeds.
Set to 0 to not process google maps embeds.
Set to 0 to not process vimeo embeds.
Set to 0 to not process iframes.
Set to 1 to not allow script tags. They will be removed completely.
Set 0 to not process script tags.
Set to 1 in order to ignore a <!-- NO_SKIFRAME --> comment. Editors will not be allowed to skip the filter.
RegEx used to identify youtube embeds (shows a youtube icon).
RegEx used to identify vimeo embeds (shows a vimeo icon).
RegEx used to identify google maps embeds (shows a google maps icon).
RegEx used to identify twitter script embeds (shows a twitter icon).
